sections.heading: Repealed.Section 49-10-2 - Repealed.Section 49-10-3 - Repealed.Section 49-10-4 - Repealed.Section 49-10-5 - Repealed.Section 49-10-6 - Repealed.
sections.text:
History:Laws 1903, ch. 77, § 1; Code 1915, § 878; C.S. 1929, § 29-1101; 1941 Comp., § 9-1001; 1953 Comp., § 8-10-1; repealed by Laws 2013, ch. 83, § 2.

Repeals.— Laws 2013, ch. 83, § 2 repealed 49-10-1 NMSA, as enacted by 1903, ch. 77, § 1, relating to management by board of trustees and corporate powers, effective June 14, 2013. For provisions of former section,seethe 2012 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.
